mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(create_time, "%Y-%m-%d") AS date, COUNT(*) AS count FROM t_article GROUP BY date ORDER BY date DESC

select a.id, a.category_id, a.category_name, a.title AS articleTitle, a.cover_image AS articleCover, a.content AS articleContent, a.is_top, a.create_time, JSON_ARRAYAGG(JSON_OBJECT('id', at.id, 'tagName', at.name)) AS tagJsonString from t_article a left join t_article_tag at ON FIND_IN_SET(at.id, a.tags) where a.status = 1
and a.category_id = #{action.categoryId}
and FIND_IN_SET(#{action.tags}, a.tags)
GROUP BY a.id ORDER BY a.id DESC
SELECT id, title AS articleTitle, cover_image AS articleCover, create_time FROM t_article WHERE `status` = 1 ORDER BY create_time

SELECT id, title AS articleTitle, content AS articleContent FROM t_article
`status` = 1
and FIND_IN_SET(#{dto.tags}, tags)
and (title like concat('%',#{dto.keyword},'%') or content like concat('%',#{dto.keyword},'%'))

select a.id, a.category_id, a.category_name, a.title as articleTitle, a.cover_image as articleCover, a.content as articleContent, a.is_forward as articleType, a.read_type as readType, a.likes as likeCount, a.views as viewCount, a.create_time, a.update_time, JSON_ARRAYAGG(JSON_OBJECT('id', at.id, 'tagName', at.name)) AS tagJsonString from t_article a left join t_article_tag at ON FIND_IN_SET(at.id, a.tags) where a.status = 1 AND a.id = #{articleId} GROUP BY a.id ORDER BY a.id DESC
SELECT id, title as articleTitle, cover_image as articleCover FROM t_article WHERE `status` = 1 AND id < #{articleId} ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT id, title as articleTitle, cover_image as articleCover FROM t_article WHERE `status` = 1 AND id > #{articleId} ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 1
